body.p:
Burlington January 1. 1861
His Excellency Beriah McGoffen
Govr of Kentucky
I hereby respectfully resign the Office of Justice of the Peace for Boone County to take effect on the 15th January 1861

Respectfully your most obt
N. E. Hawes

To His Excellency
B. Magoffin Gov Ky.
Sir

N. E. Hawes Justice of the Peace for Boone County in district No. one having resigned the office of Justice of the Peace aforesad to take effect on the 15 January 1861. You are respectfully requested to appoint Reuben Clark Green in the place and stead of said Hawes

Boone Co.
J. P. Dist No 1.
R. C. Green
vice
N. E. Hawes
Issd Jan. 7. 1860
